vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to and an expansion of Planned Development District No. 566, on property zoned an R-1/2ac(A) Single Family District and Planned Development District No. 566, on the northwest corner of Nile Drive and Rich Acres Drive
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised development plan and conditions
Z201-170(LG)
